Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes James Unger to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Authorizes James Unger, a town of West Seneca police officer, to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize James Unger to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
